titles.title: Bring Jobs Back to America Act of 2015
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the dividends received deduction for repatriated foreign earnings, and for other purposes.
Bring Jobs Back to America Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Bring Jobs Back to America Act of 2015
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the tax rate on current and accumulated foreign earnings of U.S. corporations reinvested in the United States from 35% to 5% and make such lower rate permanent.
